abstract: Billy Horschel wins McGladrey Classic golf tournament; Webb Simpson, who finished two shots behind Horschel, plans to play in the PGA Tour's final tournament, in bid to win the money title.
snippet: Webb Simpson shot a three-under-par 67 at the McGladrey Classic in St. Simons Island, Ga., leaving him two shots behind leader Billy Horschel (64).
lead_paragraph: Webb Simpson shot a three-under-par 67 at the McGladrey Classic in St. Simons Island, Ga., leaving him two shots behind leader Billy Horschel (64).
